attributes.action: A 2nd EU Referendum to be held with Compulsory Voting for the Eligible.
attributes.additional_details: The British Election Study asked a question on whether people regretted how they voted or not. Only 1% of people who voted Remain said they regretted their vote, but 6% of people who voted Leave said they regretted their vote.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to Conduct a 2nd Referendum with Compulsory voting  for all who are eligible, with an abstention option on the ballot paper. This will give a true majority of the UK voters wishes regarding the EU and a true mandate to Parliament.
